thread.title: Bulletin board for Oct. 16
thread.title_full: Bulletin board for Oct. 16 - Sports - The Buffalo News

author: buffalonews
title: Bulletin board for Oct. 16
text:
BASKETBALL: A men’s indoor league is forming on Tuesday nights. No league fee. Call 444-4906.
FLAG FOOTBALL: Men’s and coed leagues are forming. Call 444-4906.
HOCKEY: The Buffalo Stars Youth Hockey Association, in conjunction with USA Hockey, will offer a Try Hockey Free Day on Nov. 7 for boys and girls ages 4-9. The on-ice session will take place at Holiday Twin Rinks in Cheektowaga at 1:30 p.m. Register online with USA Hockey at tryhockeyforfree.com. Contact the Stars at 491-0375 or visit buffalostars.com for more.
KICKBALL: A coed indoor league is forming on Thursday nights. Six players per team, no league fee. Call 444-4906.
The Bulletin Board appears Tuesday and Friday. Information must be submitted by mail (c/o Buffalo News, Sports Dept., One News Plaza, Buffalo, NY 14240) or email ( sports@buffnews.com ). There is no charge.
